nodes.text: The Spaceward Ho! was an LAAT/i gunship used during the Clone Wars.
This gunship had customized nose art of a Twi'lek female in a seductive pose with the words "Spaceward Ho!" written in Aurebesh.
Spaceward Ho! was aboard Anakin Skywalker's Acclamator-class assault ship Defiant as it approached Teth just prior to the battle that took place there.
It later appeared on the Resolute at the time of the Battle of Ryloth.
